name: Five Nights at the Scary House
name_original: Five Nights at the Scary House
description:
This game is made for a game jam.

Open and close the doors to controls the ghosts, when they yell at you, open the door they are at. If there is a ghost in the vent, burn it on the vent cams.

Inspired by almost every single bad FNaF Fan Game, title music by Fesliyan Studios (Happy Feet, but slowed, cropped, and reversed), code by me, extremely beautiful graphics and voice acting by me.
